entries.content:
GOTCHA: User wanted to change provider indicator icon animation (typing/placeholder indicator with DNA helix). I incorrectly modified the "cooking" indicator files instead of the actual typing indicator files. The correct files are:
- Animation keyframes: src/ui/templates/css/ui-indicator/dna-keyframes.css (dnaCore animation)
- Icon styling: src/ui/templates/css/ui-indicator-claude.css (.claude-svg element)
The "cooking" indicators are a different system entirely.

User wants to use the particleCore animation from src/ui/assets/icons/qwen/particle-explosion/style.css for the provider icon in the typing indicator. This is the actual particle explosion effect they designed, not a custom one.
